description: Provides a Datadog [Logs Pipeline API](https://docs.datadoghq.com/api/?lang=python#logs-pipelines) resource, which is used to manage Datadog log pipelines order.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Name.description:
The name attribute in the resource `datadog_logs_pipeline_order` needs to be unique. It's recommended to use the same value as the resource `NAME`.
No related field is available in  [Logs Pipeline API](https://docs.datadoghq.com/api/?lang=python#get-pipeline-order).

Pipelines.description: The pipeline IDs list. The order of pipeline IDs in this attribute defines the overall pipeline order for logs.
